channel.title: Movies on Instagram.hk.cn
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on Instagram.hk.cn

item.title: 28 Years Later Sequel In Development With Original Writer & Director, New Trilogy Planned
item.description: A 28 Days Later sequel titled 28 Years Later is in development from original writer Alex Garland and director Danny Boyle with a new trilogy planned. SUMMARY Director Danny Boyle and writer Alex Garland are reuniting for a new 28 Days Later sequel, titled 28 Years Later. The film is part of a planned trilogy that aims to continue the success of the original post-apocalyptic movie. 28 Days Later is credited with revitalizing the zombie genre and influencing subsequent zombie movies and TV shows.

item.title: 8 Hunger Games Character Names That Foreshadowed Their Roles In The Story
item.description: The characters of The Hunger Games and Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes have prophetic names, which poetically align with their roles in the story. SUMMARY The names in The Hunger Games franchise have symbolic meanings that foreshadow the characters’ roles and fates. The names of the characters in The Hunger Games reflect the series’ commentary on social concepts and draw inspiration from the Roman Empire. The intricate choice of names in The Hunger Games adds layers of depth and meaning to the characters and their stories.

item.title: Aquaman 2 Box Office Disappointment Continues Shocking DCEU Trend
item.description: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom’s box office performance continues (and ultimately completes) a rather shocking trend for the DCEU as a whole. SUMMARY Following Aquaman 2, all direct DCEU sequels have made less money than their predecessors, continuing and completing a disappointing trend. External factors, such as the pandemic and the upcoming DCU reboot, have affected overall box office performance. The DCEU’s sequel numbers are not as bad as they appear, considering the circumstances surrounding their releases.
